SEARCH
Module proj.ingsw.rj
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class ClientController extends Object implements Observer
Manages the messages received from the server by calling the methods of the user interface. Creates and sends messages to the server from the user interface.
